name: Robot War Sim - City of Robots
name_original: Robot War Sim - City of Robots
description:
Robot Wars is an action packed robot battle game where you will be saving the city from criminals by riding cars and transforming into superhero robots. The survival battle begins here and you are the hero of this story. Save the city from destructive enemy robots who are waging a war on the city peace. This robot fighting game has fighter robots and fast cars and you need to reach the crime scene in time and defeat the criminals in a one-on-one battle.

You are playing the superhero in this fighting game. Once a criminal incident is reported, speed to the crime scene & transform your car into a battle ready robot and fight the enemy robot with iron knuckles. You need to win the fight and make sure that the criminals are wiped off. The enemy robot is a really good fighter and you need to be on your best robot fighting mode to win that superhero battle. Make sure you fight and defeat all the criminals and win the war to restore peace in the city. The super robot machine that can transform from a car sounds futuristic and has a superhero aura about it. It is a battle ready mean machine and can be a real menace for criminals to face in the city battle field.

Play Robot Wars as a robot fighter and warrior and be the superhero your city is looking for.

Features of Robot Wars:
+ Numerous Robot Battle Missions
+ Car driving experience
+ Real Robot Fighting Gameplay
+ Multiple robots to play with
+ Play as a car or robot
+ Awesome 3D game graphics
